  • Method Details

    • checkGoal

      public boolean checkGoal(ItemTile[][] mat)
      Goal4: "Six groups each containing at least 2 tiles of the same type (not necessarily in the depicted shape). The tiles of one group can be different from those of another group." Notes: the implementation of this function follows the Italian rules where it says "gruppi separati" as groups separated by at least 1 box in the matrix (as requested by professor Cugola in Slack.channel-requirements)
      Specified by:
      checkGoal in class CommonGoalCard
      Parameters:
      mat - matrix of ItemTile[][]
      Returns:
      boolean if the goal is reached or not

    • allNearUncheckable

      public int[][] allNearUncheckable(int[][] checkable, int x, int y)
      allNearUncheckable will put at '0' the positions of the matching tiles found Notes: allNearUncheckable is used by checkGoal1(), checkGoal3() and checkGoal4()
      Parameters:
      checkable - matrix used to skips those near, that cannot be part of other groups to count for the goal
      x - as the 'i' of the position to check
      y - as the 'j' of the position to check
      Returns:
      the matrix of checkable updated
